item.title: Beogram 4000: Adjusting the Platter and the Chassis
item.description: Having completed the restoration of the Beogram 4000, I noticed the platter wasn’t sitting correctly within its aluminum panel. It needed adjustments to align it properly. The service manual suggests adjusting the platter in relation to the chassis first, and then aligning the chassis within the enclosure. This ensures the platter sits flush and centered within the panel, achieving that desirable “Beoloving” aesthetic. To illustrate the process, I created two videos.
